name: Wolfpack Island
title: lead programmer
shortDes: an MMO in the vein of virtual worlds like Club Penguin
section1:
Platforms

Android, iOS, PC, Mac

Responsibilities
  • Implement, test, and deploy new game features and moderation tools throughout entire stack
  • Audit, assess, and resolve security concerns
  • Ensure successful cross-platform builds
  • Deploy client software to Apple App Stores, Google Play, and Steam
